sentences.english: Carries the memory of history, this is the red security spiritual sublimation.
sentences.chinese: 承载着历史的记忆，这是红安精神的升华。

sentences.english: The subject that this text studies is this case of Yongjiahe town of Hongan County of Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的主体是湖北省红安县永佳河镇这一个案。

sentences.english: Chapter three examines all sorts of relations between revolutionary songs of Hong'an and regional culture.
sentences.chinese: 第三章研究红安革命歌谣与地域文化之间的种种关系。

sentences.english: The age of the protolith of the Hong′an Group in Hubei has been a controversial issue.
sentences.chinese: 湖北红安群的原岩形成时代一直是个有争议的问题。

sentences.english: Hongan CPC Committee Secretary Xiongliang Xiao said.
sentences.chinese: 中共红安县委书记熊良霄说。
